---
description: "Improve template quality, write developer documentation with examples, add error messages and user-friendly output, polish generator prompts and defaults"
name: copilot-docs
---

# copilot-docs instructions

Write usage docs for each generator/executor. Include CLI examples: nx g @crispy/nx-cloudflare:init, nx g @crispy/nx-cloudflare:worker, etc. Add troubleshooting sections for common errors.
